txt.en: Ostasänt can be found in Sûri-kylä.\n\nYou should speak with Ostasänt.
Roving Threat: Ukko Surma, the Undying Giant
Evil stirs in the Northern realm, including Ukko Surma, whose resurrected body seems to be controlled by another.
Ukko Surma can be found somewhere in Forochel.\n\nYou should defeat Ukko Surma.

'An evil seeps through the ice like water running off a glacier in spring.

'I have seen a Giant wandering the frozen plains. You may not believe me, but it is not a creature of the living. His skin is decayed, frozen, and there is a strange glow around him! Could it be a Wight or perhaps something worse?

'My people need less to fear. Tales of this Giant they call Ukko Surma are already starting to spread.'

'This foul creature is no more? This is good news for all of Forochel.\n\n'What is this you say? You believe that this Giant may have been controlled by some other mysterious force. The dark winds from the East must have something to do with this.'
